creditline: The Winton Jones Endowment Fund for Prints and Drawings
description: seated St. Jerome wearing a draping garment, looking upward; saint holds rock on top of book at R; crucifix at R; other books at L; tree trunks and foliage in background
provenance: [Craddock and Barnard, London]; Sale, Sotheby's, London, March 30, 2010, part of no. 8, to MIA
signed: LRC, in the plate: [An. Caracci. fe.]; along lower edge, in the plate: [P. S.]
title: Saint Jerome in the Wilderness
